cleaned_text: Best Aromatherapists in Upper North Shore Region NSW Member since 2008 Sore Back? Aching Shoulders? Stressed? FEEL BETTER NOW WITH A THERAPEUTIC MASSAGE - Open 7 days 9am to 9pm Member since 2012 Remedial Massage, Aromatherapy, Swedish/Relaxation Massage, Lymphatic Drainage, Pregnancy Massage, Mobile Massage Services Member since 2010 Holistic Massage Therapies, specializes in: Remedial Massage, Hawaiian Massage, Stone Therapy Massage and Craniosacral Therapy. Holistic Massage Therapies has also opened a new clinic next door to incorporate new holistic treatments, art therapy and workshops. See our other natural therapies pages for more information. Member since 2015 As a qualified Iridologist and Vitality, Longevity and Healthy Ageing (VLA) Practitioner, Kimberley uses a range of professional clinical tools that allows her to assess your hydration levels, body composition and overall health status. Kimberley can provide a complete Wellness program to help you achieve your wellness goals Member since 2023 TDMall clinic emphasizes on the natural and preventive approach by offering various treatment modalities including Acupuncture, Chinese Herbal Medicine, Remedial Massage, Aromatherapy, Moxibustion, Acupressure Massage, Tuina, Cupping Therapy and Scrapping. Supporting treatment for Chronic Pain, Headache, Skin Rejuvenation, Insomnia, Cancer, Women's Health, and Weight Management.
